item.description:
Hello Conscious Creators!

Groups are wonderful! They help bolster your commitment and motivation, they supply you with opportunities to get ahead on your journey, and they provide support from the other members.

When it comes to EFT, groups are even more wonderful! Not only is there a synergy created between the tappers increasing the potency of healing received, but even when the tapping isn't related to your particular problem, you still get to borrow benefits from it!

Please Join us:

For an evening of putting this newly found skill into practice. We will get the chance to discuss some of our eating, health or other blocks, and then Lucie will guide us through, using EFT

It is time start tapping with Lucie Monroe.

Lucie is an intuitive wellness coach and certified EFT Expert who specializes in pain management, relationship issues and emotional eating. She helps her clients create the life they want by removing the blocks through EFT.

And after the effort, relaxation and a potluck snack. Please feel free to bring a healthy snack to share.

This group is for everyone, whether you are looking to release some extra weight or create a healthier life style. This intimate group will consist of 10-15 Creators who really want to manifest a change in their life. Come to one or all. The more you join us, the more changes you will see.

We will be meet from 7:00pm-9:00pm.

Please call me if this is your first time joining us.
See you there!

Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830
item.how_to_find_us: We will disclose location after signing up

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: EFT Tapping Circle with Lucie Monroe
